00099 /**
00100  * @brief Run the analysis.
00101  */
00102 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run()
00103 {
00104     if (m_pEngine == NULL) {return;}
00105     AffxString famFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("familial-file");
00106     AffxString strOutDirName = m_pEngine->getOpt("out-dir");
00107     AffxString strFileName = Fs::join(strOutDirName,famFileName);
00108     Verbose::out(1, "Writing familial-file: " + strFileName);
00109 
00110     // check whether to write Relatedness data
00111     m_bIncludeRelatedness = m_pEngine->getOptBool("relatedness-test");
00112 
00113     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData data;
00114     setupHeader(strFileName, data);
00115 
00116     // write the file.
00117     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer = new affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter(&data.Header());
00118     writer->WriteHeader();
00119     writeDataGroupAndDataSetHeaders(writer);
00120     writeDataSetData(writer);
00121 
00122     delete writer;
00123 
00124     // Convert from calvin to text format?
00125     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("text-output"))
00126     {
00127         CalvinToText converter;
00128         converter.run(strFileName, strFileName + ".txt", m_pEngine->getOptBool("text-header"), true, true, 2);
00129     }
00130 }
00131 
00132 /**
00133  * @brief Setup the file header in memory before writing if out
00134  * @param const AffxString& - The file name
00135  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00136  */
00137 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupHeader(const AffxString& strFileName, affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data)
00138 {
00139     addParentHeaders(data);
00140     data.Header().SetFilename(strFileName);
00141     data.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader(L"Familial"));
00142     //data.Header().AddDataGroupHdr(affymetrix_calvin_io::DataGroupHeader(L"Segments"));
00143 
00144     // Setup the header.
00145     affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr();
00146     pHeader->SetFileCreationTime(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00147     addStandardHeader(pHeader, m_pEngine);
00148     ///@todo add in headers
00149     //addPgOptions(pHeader, m_pEngine->getOptions(), "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-");
00150     //addPgOptions(pHeader, m_pEngine->getStates(), "affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-");
00151     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::getParams().size()); iIndex++)
00152     {
00153         pHeader->AddNameValParam(CNFamilialAnalysisMethod::getParams().at(iIndex));
00154     }
00155 
00156     // set up the data set headers.
00157     int iGroupIndex = 0;
00158     //JPB: setupDataSetHeaderSamples() and setupDataSetHeaderPaternityTesting() may end up inside the for loop
00159     setupDataSetHeaderSamples(data, iGroupIndex);
00160     if (m_bIncludeRelatedness) {
00161       setupDataSetHeaderPaternityTesting(data, iGroupIndex);
00162     }
00163     setupDataSetHeaderMIE(data, iGroupIndex);
00164     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00165     {
00166         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00167         if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())  {continue;}
00168         else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis()) {setupDataSetHeaderSegmentOverlaps(data, pMethod, iGroupIndex);}
00169         else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis()) {continue;}
00170         else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00171     }
00172     iGroupIndex++;
00173     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00174     {
00175         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00176         if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())  {continue;}
00177         else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis()) {continue;}
00178         else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis()) {setupDataSetHeaderSegments(data, pMethod, iGroupIndex);}
00179         else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00180     }
00181 }
00182 
00183 /**
00184  * @brief Add parent file header to the header for this file
00185  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00186  */
00187 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::addParentHeaders(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data)
00188 {
00189     CNCychp& cychpIndex = getCychpIndex();
00190     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00191     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00192 
00193     // Copy over headers from the cychp files.
00194     try
00195     {
00196         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
00197         if (cychpIndex.getFileName() != "")
00198         {
00199             affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
00200             reader.SetFilename(cychpIndex.getFileName().c_str());
00201             reader.Open(genericData);
00202             data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00203             genericData.Clear();
00204         }
00205         if (cychpMother.getFileName() != "")
00206         {
00207             affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
00208             reader.SetFilename(cychpMother.getFileName().c_str());
00209             reader.Open(genericData);
00210             data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00211             genericData.Clear();
00212         }
00213         if (cychpFather.getFileName() != "")
00214         {
00215             affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
00216             reader.SetFilename(cychpFather.getFileName().c_str());
00217             reader.Open(genericData);
00218             data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00219             genericData.Clear();
00220         }
00221     } catch(...) {Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Load parent header failed.");}
00222 
00223 }

00225 /**
00226  * @brief Add the standard file header information
00227  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* - The header to load
00228  * @param BaseEngine* - The engine to get parameter information from
00229  */
00230 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::addStandardHeader(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader, BaseEngine* pEngine)
00231 {
00232     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00233 
00234     pHeader->SetFileTypeId("affymetrix-multi-data-type-analysis");
00235 
00236     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-file-name");
00237     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getXMLParameterFileName())));
00238     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00239 
00240     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-file-guid");
00241     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(m_pEngine->getXMLParameterFileGuid()));
00242     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00243 
00244     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-name");
00245     param.SetValueText(L"CYTO2");
00246     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00247 
00248     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-version");
00249     param.SetValueText(L"1.0.0");
00250     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00251 
00252     param.SetName(L"program-name");
00253     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(pEngine->getOpt("program-name")));
00254     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00255 
00256     param.SetName(L"program-version");
00257     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(pEngine->getOpt("program-version")));
00258     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00259 
00260     param.SetName(L"program-company");
00261     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS("Affymetrix"));
00262     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00263 
00264     param.SetName(L"create-date");
00265     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Util::getTimeStamp()));
00266     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00267 
00268     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-file-name");
00269     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(pEngine->getXMLParameterFileName())));
00270     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00271 
00272     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-file-guid");
00273     param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(pEngine->getXMLParameterFileGuid()));
00274     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00275 
00276     param.SetName(L"affymetrix-algorithm-param-familial-file-version");
00277     param.SetValueInt32(2);
00278     pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00279 }

00281 /**
00282  * @brief Dump the specified PgOptions into the header
00283  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* - The header to load
00284  * @param PgOptions& - The options to dump
00285  * @param const AffxString& - The prefix to use when naming the options
00286  */
00287 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::addPgOptions(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericDataHeader* pHeader, PgOptions& opt, const AffxString& strPrefix)
00288 {
00289     affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00290     for(int i=0; i< opt.m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00291         if ((int)opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_values.size() > 1)
00292         {
00293             for(int j=0; j< opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_values.size(); j++)
00294             {
00295                 loadParam(strPrefix + opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_longName + "-" + ::getInt(j+1), opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_type, opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_values[j], param);
00296                 pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00297             }
00298         }
00299         else
00300         {
00301             loadParam(strPrefix + opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_longName, opt.m_option_vec[i]->m_type, opt.m_option_vec[i]->getValue(), param);
00302             pHeader->AddNameValParam(param);
00303         }
00304     }
00305 }
00306 
00307 /**
00308  * @brief Load a parameter from it's components
00309  * @param const AffxString& - The name of the parameter
00310  * @param PgOpt::PgOptType - The type of the parameter
00311  * @param const AffxString& - The value of the parameter
00312  * @param affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType& - The parameter to load
00313  */
00314 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::loadParam(const AffxString& strName, PgOpt::PgOptType type, const AffxString& strValue, affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType& param)
00315 {
00316     param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strName));
00317     switch(type)
00318     {
00319     case PgOpt::BOOL_OPT: param.SetValueInt8(((strValue == "true") ? (char)1 : (char)0)); break;
00320     case PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT: param.SetValueFloat((float)::getDouble(strValue)); break;
00321     case PgOpt::INT_OPT: param.SetValueInt32(::getInt(strValue)); break;
00322     case PgOpt::STRING_OPT:
00323         if ((strName.indexOf("command-line") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("analysis") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("program-cvs-id") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("version-to-report") != -1) || (strName.endsWith("-dir")))
00324         {
00325             param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strValue));
00326         }
00327         else
00328         {
00329             param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(strValue)));
00330         }
00331         break;
00332     default: throw(Except("Cannot find PgOpt type for: " + strName));
00333     }
00334 }

00336 /**
00337  * @brief Setup the Samples data set
00338  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00339  * @param int - The group index
00340  */
00341 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSetHeaderSamples(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, int iGroupIndex)
00342 {
00343     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00344     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00345 
00346     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsHeader;
00347     if ((cychpMother.getFileName() != "") && (cychpFather.getFileName() != ""))
00348     {
00349         dsHeader.SetRowCnt(3);
00350     }
00351     else
00352     {
00353         dsHeader.SetRowCnt(2);
00354     }
00355     dsHeader.SetName(L"Samples");
00356     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"SampleKey");
00357     dsHeader.AddUnicodeColumn(L"CHPFilename", 256);
00358     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"CHPID", 55);
00359     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"Role", 21);
00360     data.Header().GetDataGroup(iGroupIndex).AddDataSetHdr(dsHeader);
00361 }

00363 /**
00364  * @brief Setup the PaternityTesting data set
00365  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00366  * @param int - The group index
00367  */
00368 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSetHeaderPaternityTesting(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, int iGroupIndex)
00369 {
00370     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00371     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00372 
00373     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsHeader;
00374     if ((cychpMother.getFileName() != "") && (cychpFather.getFileName() != ""))
00375     {
00376         dsHeader.SetRowCnt(3);
00377     }
00378     else
00379     {
00380         dsHeader.SetRowCnt(1);
00381     }
00382     dsHeader.SetName(L"RelatednessTest");
00383     dsHeader.AddUByteColumn(L"AnalysisType");
00384     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"ReferenceSampleKey");
00385     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"FamilialSampleKey");
00386     dsHeader.AddUByteColumn(L"RoleValidity");
00387     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"RoleIndexScore");
00388     data.Header().GetDataGroup(iGroupIndex).AddDataSetHdr(dsHeader);
00389 }

00391 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSetHeaderMIE(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, int iGroupIndex)
00392 {
00393     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsHeader;
00394     dsHeader.SetRowCnt(23);     // # autosomes + X chromosome
00395 
00396     dsHeader.SetName(L"MIE");
00397     dsHeader.AddUByteColumn(L"Chromosome");
00398     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"Display", 4);
00399     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"MarkerCount");
00400     dsHeader.AddIntColumn(L"MIE-Trio");
00401     dsHeader.AddIntColumn(L"MIE-Mat");
00402     dsHeader.AddIntColumn(L"MIE-Pat");
00403     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"Percent-Trio-MIE");
00404     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"Percent-Mat-MIE");
00405     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"Percent-Pat-MIE");
00406     data.Header().GetDataGroup(iGroupIndex).AddDataSetHdr(dsHeader);
00407 }

00409 /**
00410  * @brief Setup the Segment Overlaps data set
00411  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00412  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The analysis method to load data from
00413  * @param int - The group index
00414  */
00415 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSetHeaderSegmentOverlaps(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex)
00416 {
00417     if (pMethod == NULL) {return;}
00418     int iSegmentCount = ((pMethod == NULL) ? 0 : pMethod->getSegmentOverlapCount());
00419     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsHeader;
00420     dsHeader.SetRowCnt(iSegmentCount);
00421     dsHeader.SetName(L"SegmentOverlaps");
00422     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"SegmentType", 21);
00423     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"ReferenceSampleKey");
00424     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"ReferenceSegmentID", 55);
00425     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"FamilialSampleKey");
00426     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"FamilialSegmentID", 55);
00427     data.Header().GetDataGroup(iGroupIndex).AddDataSetHdr(dsHeader);
00428 }

00430 /**
00431  * @brief Setup the Segments data set
00432  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& - The object to load the data into
00433  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The analysis method to load data from
00434  * @param int - The group index
00435  */
00436 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSetHeaderSegments(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& data, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex)
00437 {
00438     if (pMethod == NULL) {return;}
00439     int iSegmentCount = ((pMethod == NULL) ? 0 : pMethod->getSegmentCount());
00440     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader dsHeader;
00441     dsHeader.SetRowCnt(iSegmentCount);
00442     dsHeader.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(pMethod->getSegmentTypeString()));
00443     dsHeader.AddAsciiColumn(L"SegmentID", 55);
00444     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"ReferenceSampleKey");
00445     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"FamilialSampleKey");
00446     dsHeader.AddUByteColumn(L"Chromosome");
00447     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"StartPosition");
00448     dsHeader.AddUIntColumn(L"StopPosition");
00449     dsHeader.AddUByteColumn(L"Call");
00450     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"Confidence");
00451     dsHeader.AddIntColumn(L"MarkerCount");
00452     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"Homozygosity");
00453     dsHeader.AddFloatColumn(L"Heterozygosity");
00454     data.Header().GetDataGroup(iGroupIndex).AddDataSetHdr(dsHeader);
00455 }

00457 /**
00458  * @brief Write the data group and data set headers
00459  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00460  * @return int - The offset to the samples data set
00461  */
00462 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataGroupAndDataSetHeaders(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer)
00463 {
00464     int iGroupIndex = 0;
00465     int iSetIndex = 0;
00466 
00467     // write out the familial analysis header
00468     writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).WriteHeader();
00469 
00470     // write out the segement overlap analysis header
00471     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00472     {
00473         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00474         int iMethodDatasetCnt = 0;
00475         if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis()) {
00476           iMethodDatasetCnt = (m_bIncludeRelatedness ? 3 : 2);
00477         }
00478         else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis()) {
00479           iMethodDatasetCnt = 1;
00480         }
00481         else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())  {
00482           iMethodDatasetCnt = 0;
00483         }
00484         else {
00485            throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));
00486         }
00487         for (int i=0; i<iMethodDatasetCnt; i++) {
00488           pMethod->setDataSetOffsetVec(setupDataSet(writer, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex));
00489           iSetIndex++;
00490         }
00491     }
00492 
00493     // write out the segment type analysis header
00494     //iGroupIndex++;
00495     //iSetIndex = 0;
00496     //writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).WriteHeader();
00497     //for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00498     //{
00499     //    CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00500     //    if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())  {continue;}
00501     //    else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis()) {continue;}
00502     //    else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())
00503     //    {
00504     //        pMethod->setDataSetOffset(setupDataSet(writer, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex));
00505     //        iSetIndex++;
00506     //    }
00507     //    else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00508     //}
00509     //return iFamilialOffset;
00510 }
00511 
00512 /**
00513  * @brief Setup the data set
00514  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00515  * @param int - The group index
00516  * @param int - The set index
00517  * @return int - The offset to the data set
00518  */
00519 int CNFamilialReporterFamilial::setupDataSet(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00520 {
00521     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00522     setWriter.WriteHeader();
00523     int iOffset = writer->GetFilePos();
00524     writer->SeekFromCurrentPos(setWriter.GetDataSetSize() + 1);
00525     setWriter.UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00526     writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).UpdateNextDataGroupPos();
00527     return iOffset;
00528 }
00529 
00530 /**
00531  * @brief Write the data set data
00532  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00533  * @param int - The offset to the Samples data set
00534  */
00535 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetData(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer)
00536 {
00537     int iGroupIndex = 0;
00538     int iSetIndex = 0;
00539 
00540     // write out the familial and segment overlap analysis data
00541     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00542     {
00543         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00544         if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())
00545         {
00546             writeDataSetSamples(writer, pMethod, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00547             iSetIndex++;
00548             if (m_bIncludeRelatedness) {
00549               writeDataSetPaternityTesting(writer, pMethod, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00550               iSetIndex++;
00551             }
00552             writeDataSetMIE(writer, pMethod, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00553             iSetIndex++;
00554         }
00555         else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis())
00556         {
00557             writeDataSetSegmentOverlaps(writer, pMethod, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00558             iSetIndex++;
00559         }
00560         else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())  {continue;}
00561         else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00562     }
00563 
00564     // write out the segment type analysis data
00565     iGroupIndex++;
00566     iSetIndex = 0;
00567     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++)
00568     {
00569         CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod = m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00570         if (pMethod->isFamilialAnalysis())  {continue;}
00571         else if (pMethod->isSegmentOverlapAnalysis()) {continue;}
00572         else if (pMethod->isSegmentTypeAnalysis())
00573         {
00574             writeDataSetSegments(writer, pMethod, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00575             iSetIndex++;
00576         }
00577         else {throw(Except("CNFamilialReporterFamilial::run(...) Unknown CNFamilialAnalysisMethod: " + pMethod->getName()));}
00578     }
00579 }
00580 
00581 /**
00582  * @brief Write the Samples data set data
00583  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00584  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The analysis method to load data from
00585  * @param int - The group index
00586  * @param int - The set index
00587  */
00588 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetSamples(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00589 {
00590     CNCychp& cychpIndex = getCychpIndex();
00591     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00592     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00593 
00594     writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pMethod->getDataSetOffsetVec().at(iSetIndex));
00595     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00596     setWriter.Write(0);
00597     setWriter.Write(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(cychpIndex.getFileName())), 256);
00598     setWriter.Write(cychpIndex.getCychpHeader().getChpID(), 55);
00599     setWriter.Write(cychpIndex.getFamilialType(), 21);
00600 
00601     if (cychpMother.getFileName() != "")
00602     {
00603         setWriter.Write(1);
00604         setWriter.Write(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(cychpMother.getFileName())), 256);
00605         setWriter.Write(cychpMother.getCychpHeader().getChpID(), 55);
00606         setWriter.Write(cychpMother.getFamilialType(), 21);
00607     }
00608 
00609     if (cychpFather.getFileName() != "")
00610     {
00611         setWriter.Write(2);
00612         setWriter.Write(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(cychpFather.getFileName())), 256);
00613         setWriter.Write(cychpFather.getCychpHeader().getChpID(), 55);
00614         setWriter.Write(cychpFather.getFamilialType(), 21);
00615     }
00616 }
00617 
00618 /**
00619  * @brief Write the PaternityTesting data set data
00620  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00621  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The analysis method to load data from
00622  * @param int - The group index
00623  * @param int - The set index
00624  */
00625 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetPaternityTesting(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00626 {
00627     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00628     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00629 
00630     writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pMethod->getDataSetOffsetVec().at(iSetIndex));
00631     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00632 
00633     if (cychpMother.getFileName() != "" && cychpFather.getFileName() != "")
00634     {
00635         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)0);    // paternity with maternity assumed
00636         setWriter.Write(0);                   // child sample ID
00637         setWriter.Write(2);                   // father sample ID
00638         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)cychpFather.getFamilialCall());
00639         setWriter.Write((float)cychpFather.getFamilialConfidence());
00640     }
00641 
00642     if (cychpMother.getFileName() != "")
00643     {
00644         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)1);    // maternity
00645         setWriter.Write(0);                   // child sample ID
00646         setWriter.Write(1);                   // mother sample ID
00647         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)cychpMother.getFamilialCall());
00648         setWriter.Write((float)cychpMother.getFamilialConfidence());
00649     }
00650 
00651     if (cychpFather.getFileName() != "")
00652     {
00653         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)2);    // paternity
00654         setWriter.Write(0);                   // child sample ID
00655         setWriter.Write(2);                   // father sample ID
00656         setWriter.Write((unsigned char)cychpFather.getFamilialDuoCall());
00657         setWriter.Write((float)cychpFather.getFamilialDuoConfidence());
00658     }
00659 }
00660 
00661 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetMIE(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00662 {
00663     const int iXChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome");
00664     const int iYChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("yChromosome");
00665     const int lastAutosome = 22;
00666 
00667     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00668     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00669     const bool motherPresent = cychpMother.getFileName() != "";
00670     const bool fatherPresent = cychpFather.getFileName() != "";
00671 
00672     writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pMethod->getDataSetOffsetVec().at(iSetIndex));
00673     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00674 
00675     std::vector<unsigned char> vChromosomes;
00676 
00677     // copy all keys of CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount to vChromosomes
00678     std::transform(
00679                 CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount.begin(),
00680                 CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount.end(), 
00681                 std::back_inserter(vChromosomes),
00682                 affxstl::select1st<std::map<unsigned char, unsigned int>::value_type>()
00683                 );
00684 
00685     std::sort(vChromosomes.begin(), vChromosomes.end());
00686 
00687     for (unsigned char chr = 1; chr < iYChromosome; chr++)
00688     {
00689         if (chr > lastAutosome && chr < iXChromosome) {
00690             continue;
00691         }
00692         AffxString displayStr;
00693         if (chr == iXChromosome) {
00694             displayStr = "  X";
00695         } else {
00696             displayStr = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(StringUtils::ToString(chr, 4, L' '));
00697         }
00698         if (std::binary_search(vChromosomes.begin(), vChromosomes.end(), chr))
00699         {
00700             // data available
00701             setWriter.Write(chr);                               // chromosome number
00702             setWriter.Write(displayStr, 4);                     // chromosome number as string
00703             int iMarkerCount = CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount[chr];
00704             setWriter.Write(iMarkerCount);      // number of genotypeable markers
00705             if (motherPresent && fatherPresent)
00706             {
00707                 setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMIE_Trio[chr]);         // MIE-Trio
00708                 setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMIE_Mat[chr]);          // MIE-Mat
00709                 setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMIE_Pat[chr]);          // MIE-Pat
00710                 setWriter.Write(100.0f * ((float) CNCychp::m_mMIE_Trio[chr] / (float) iMarkerCount));         // Percent-Trio-MIE
00711                 setWriter.Write(100.0f * ((float) CNCychp::m_mMIE_Mat[chr] / (float) iMarkerCount));          // Percent-Mat-MIE
00712                 setWriter.Write(100.0f * ((float) CNCychp::m_mMIE_Pat[chr] / (float) iMarkerCount));          // Percent-Pat-MIE
00713             }
00714             else if (motherPresent)
00715             {
00716                 setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Trio
00717                 setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMIE_Mat[chr]);          // MIE-Mat
00718                 setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Pat
00719                 setWriter.Write(0.0f);                               // Percent-Trio-MIE
00720                 setWriter.Write(100.0f * ((float) CNCychp::m_mMIE_Mat[chr] / (float) iMarkerCount));          // Percent-Mat-MIE
00721                 setWriter.Write(0.0f);                               // Percent-Pat-MIE
00722             }
00723             else if (fatherPresent)
00724             {
00725                 setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Trio
00726                 setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Mat
00727                 setWriter.Write(CNCychp::m_mMIE_Pat[chr]);          // MIE-Pat
00728                 setWriter.Write(0.0f);                               // Percent-Trio-MIE
00729                 setWriter.Write(0.0f);                               // Percent-Mat-MIE
00730                 setWriter.Write(100.0f * ((float) CNCychp::m_mMIE_Pat[chr] / (float) iMarkerCount));          // Percent-Pat-MIE
00731             }
00732         }
00733         else {
00734             // data not available
00735             setWriter.Write(chr);                               // chromosome number
00736             setWriter.Write(displayStr, 4);                     // chromosome number as string
00737             setWriter.Write(0);                                 // number of genotypeable markers
00738             setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Trio
00739             setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Mat
00740             setWriter.Write(-1);                                // MIE-Pat
00741             setWriter.Write(0.0f);                               // Percent-Trio-MIE
00742             setWriter.Write(0.0f);                               // Percent-Mat-MIE
00743             setWriter.Write(0.0f);                               // Percent-Pat-MIE
00744         }
00745     }
00746 }
00747 
00748 /**
00749  * @brief Write the SegmentOverlaps data set data
00750  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00751  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The method to get the data from
00752  * @param int - The group index
00753  * @param int - The set index
00754  */
00755 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetSegmentOverlaps(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00756 {
00757     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00758     if (pMethod != NULL)
00759     {
00760         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pMethod->getDataSetOffsetVec().at(iSetIndex));
00761         for (int i = 0; (i < pMethod->getSegmentOverlaps().getCount()); i++)
00762         {
00763             CNSegmentOverlap* p = pMethod->getSegmentOverlaps().getAt(i);
00764             setWriter.Write(p->SegmentType, 21);
00765             setWriter.Write(p->ReferenceSampleKey);
00766             setWriter.Write(p->ReferenceSegmentID, 55);
00767             setWriter.Write(p->FamilialSampleKey);
00768             setWriter.Write(p->FamilialSegmentID, 55);
00769         }
00770     }
00771 }
00772 
00773 /**
00774  * @brief Write the Segments data set data
00775  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00776  * @param CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The method to get the data from
00777  * @param int - The group index
00778  * @param int - The set index
00779  */
00780 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeDataSetSegments(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* pMethod, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00781 {
00782     if (pMethod != NULL)
00783     {
00784         writer->SeekFromBeginPos(pMethod->getDataSetOffsetVec().at(iSetIndex));
00785         for (int i = 0; (i < pMethod->getIndexSegments().getCount()); i++)
00786         {
00787             CNSegment* p = pMethod->getIndexSegments().getAt(i);
00788             writeStandardSegment(writer, p, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00789         }
00790         for (int i = 0; (i < pMethod->getMotherSegments().getCount()); i++)
00791         {
00792             CNSegment* p = pMethod->getMotherSegments().getAt(i);
00793             writeStandardSegment(writer, p, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00794         }
00795         for (int i = 0; (i < pMethod->getFatherSegments().getCount()); i++)
00796         {
00797             CNSegment* p = pMethod->getFatherSegments().getAt(i);
00798             writeStandardSegment(writer, p, iGroupIndex, iSetIndex);
00799         }
00800     }
00801 }
00802 
00803 /**
00804  * @brief Write the Segments data set data
00805  * @param affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* - The generic calvin file writer
00806  * @param CNSegment* - The segment to write out
00807  * @param int - The group index
00808  * @param int - The set index
00809  */
00810 void CNFamilialReporterFamilial::writeStandardSegment(affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileWriter* writer, CNSegment* p, int iGroupIndex, int iSetIndex)
00811 {
00812     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetWriter& setWriter = writer->GetDataGroupWriter(iGroupIndex).GetDataSetWriter(iSetIndex);
00813     setWriter.Write(p->getSegmentName(), 55);
00814     setWriter.Write(0);
00815     setWriter.Write(p->getFamilialSampleKey());
00816     setWriter.Write((unsigned char)p->getChromosome());
00817     setWriter.Write((unsigned int)p->getStartPosition());
00818     setWriter.Write((unsigned int)p->getEndPosition());
00819     setWriter.Write((unsigned char)p->getCall());
00820     setWriter.Write((float)p->getConfidence());
00821     setWriter.Write(p->getMarkerCount());
00822     setWriter.Write((float)p->getHomozygosity());
00823     setWriter.Write((float)p->getHeterozygosity());
00824 }
